categories: Category:Imperial Intelligence personnel of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Lekern Renald was a male Human who served in Imperial Intelligence of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY he served as a station chief in Sobrik on Balmorra, where he assisted Cipher Nine during the Operation: Blackout. Renald put Cipher in contact with Sanju Pyne, which allowed the agent to infiltrate the Balmorran resistance and get close to his ultimate target - the Gray Star.
